credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 28 x 30 cm (11 x 11 13/16 in.)
title: Moudang
medium:
Medium: stainless steel, twisted and plied
Technique: slit tapestry with areas of twill and paired warps, four selvedges
description: Composition of irregular squares and rectangles in shades of brown and blue. The fiber is not dyed. The color changes are the result of changes in the molecular structure of the steel through a process of sequential heating and cooling.
name: Textile
